response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I'm extending a special offer. For a limited time only, you have the chance to acquire this product for $12,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the value it brings. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.", "product_price": 12000}
